cont.entity_a: Nails fell out, causing it to fall apart. Handle can bend under pressure and may need reinforcement. Some issues with handle durability; handle may become loose.
cont.entity_b: Handles may become loose after dishwasher use; hand washing recommended. Handles may need tightening, and metal may rust if not properly maintained. Handles are not well attached and may fall apart. Wood handles are prone to splitting if not hand-washed.

cont.entity_a: The blade is only 6.5 inches wide, not meeting the 14.75 inches needed. Large size is good for flipping big items like burgers and pancakes. Not as large as expected.
Durable with a nice sharp edge and a well-attached handle. Well-constructed with durable materials, but edges may need filing to debur.
cont.entity_b: Sturdy with flexible metal paddles and solid wooden handles. Edges are jagged and can scrape surfaces. Stainless steel is sturdy.

Functionality.comm: Can be used for various tasks.

cont.entity_a: Can flip eggs, cut meat, slice pizza, and is dishwasher safe. Perfect for flipping and pressing burgers, and has saved time in a high-demand setting. Great for picking up pie dough without breaking it. Beveled edge makes it easy to slip under pancakes.
cont.entity_b: Suitable for heavy-duty tasks, but not for non-stick cookware. Good for grilling with a solid feel and well-made construction.

cont.entity_a: Handle is not fully covered, requiring a glove when hot.
cont.entity_b: Handles can be loose, and the spatula may be flimsy. Metal thickness may require modification for better performance.

cont.entity_a: Not dishwasher safe as it may rust.
cont.entity_b: Handles may become loose after dishwasher use; hand washing recommended. Wood handles are prone to splitting if not hand-washed.
Affordable with good quality for the price, but not professional grade.
